label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • EnabledTechiesinCaptains Mode

label: Skull Basher
descriptionHtml:
• Now uses Mithril Hammer instead of Javelin
    • Gives +25 Damage and +10 Strength
  • Bash no longer pierces evasion

label: Abyssal Blade
descriptionHtml:
• Now grants +25 Damage
  • Bash no longer pierces evasion

label: Monkey King Bar
descriptionHtml:
• Now uses Demon Edge, Quarterstaff, and Javelin
    • Gives +52 Damage and 10 Attack Speed
  • Procs changed from 60 Pure damage to 100 Magical damage

label: Maelstrom
descriptionHtml:
• Now uses Javelin instead of Gloves and a Recipe
  • No longer gives +25 Attack Speed
  • Chain Lightning damage increased from 120 to 170
  • Procs can no longer be evaded

label: Mjollnir
descriptionHtml:
• Procs can no longer be evaded
  • Chain Lightning damage increased from 150 to 170
  • Attack speed reduced from 80 to 75

label: Battle Fury
descriptionHtml: • Now requires a 300 gold recipe

label: Blink Dagger
descriptionHtml: • Cooldown increased from 14 to 15

label: Boots of Travel
descriptionHtml: • Building prioritization range increased from 700 to 900

label: Dagon
descriptionHtml: • Mana cost rescaled from 180 to 120/140/160/180/200

label: Force Staff
descriptionHtml:
• Now requires a Ring of Regeneration instead of a Ring of Health (total price is still the same)
  • Mana cost increased from 25 to 100
  • Health regen reduced from 5 to 2

label: Hurricane Pike
descriptionHtml:
• Health regen reduced from 5.5 to 2
  • Mana cost increased from 25 to 100

label: Helm of the Dominator
descriptionHtml:
• Health regen decreased from 8 to 7
  • No longer grants +5 attack speed to the item holder
  • Bounty increased from 125 to 200

label: Linken's Sphere
descriptionHtml: • All Stats reduced from 15 to 13

label: Magic Wand
descriptionHtml:
• Now requires a 150 gold recipe instead of a Mango
  • Now provides +3 All Stats instead of +2 All Stats and 1.5 HP Regen
  • Max Charges increased from 17 to 20

label: Enchanted Mango
descriptionHtml:
• On sale now from 100 to 70
  • Health regen decreased from 1 to 0.7
  • Consumed mana restore reduced from 175 to 125
  • Daily Bonus Hero now gives 2 Mangoes

label: Necronomicon
descriptionHtml: • Duration increased from 50 to 60

label: Phase Boots
descriptionHtml:
• During Phase your base turn rate is improved to 1 (the highest value, can still be lowered by other effects)
  • Active duration increased from 2.5 to 3 seconds
  • Active speed reduced from 24/20% to 20/16%

label: Observer Ward
descriptionHtml: • Gold/XP Bounty rescaled from a constant 100 Gold and 100 XP to growing over time with 100 + 2/min Gold and 50 + 4/min XP

label: Sange
descriptionHtml:
• Recipe cost increased from 500 to 700
  • Now grants Greater Maim

label: Heaven's Halberd
descriptionHtml: • Now grants Greater Maim

label: Yasha
descriptionHtml: • Recipe cost increased from 500 to 700

label: Manta Style
descriptionHtml: • Recipe cost lowered from 900 to 500

label: Alchemist
descriptionHtml:
• Chemical RageHealth regen increased from 40/48/56 to 40/55/70
  • Bounty Runebonus gold increased from 2.5× to 3×

label: Ancient Apparition
descriptionHtml:
• Chilling Touchdamage rescaled from 30/45/60/75 to 20/40/60/80
  • Chilling Touch no longer pierces Spell Immunity

label: Arc Warden
descriptionHtml:
• Magnetic Fieldcooldown reduced from 35/30/25/20 to 20
  • Level 15 Talent changed from +3s Flux Duration to +400 Flux Cast Range

label: Axe
descriptionHtml:
• Battle Hungermana cost rescaled from 75 to 50/60/70/80
  • Base movement speed increased by 5

label: Batrider
descriptionHtml: • Base strength increased by 3

label: Bloodseeker
descriptionHtml:
• Blood Riteground vision now increased to match the AoE of the spell (from 400 to 600)
  • Bloodragecooldown reduced from 12/10/8/6 to 9/8/7/6

label: Brewmaster
descriptionHtml: • Primal SplitFirePermanent Immolationdamage increased from 15/30/45 to 20/40/60

label: Broodmother
descriptionHtml:
• Spideritebounty reduced from 16-21 gold and 20 exp to 3 gold and 3 xp
  • Spiderlingbounty reduced from 11-13 gold and 31 exp to 9 gold and 9 xp
  • Spiderite armor reduced from 8 to 0
  • Spiderling armor reduced from 8 to 0
  • Spiderling damage reduced from 18-19 to 14-16 (~19% less)
  • Spawn Spiderlingsmana cost reduced from 120 to 100
  • Spawn Spiderlings cooldown reduced from 10 to 11/10/9/8

label: Chen
descriptionHtml: • Hand of Godheal improved from 250/375/500 to 250/400/550

label: Crystal Maiden
descriptionHtml:
• Base armor increased by 1
  • Freezing Fieldattack speed slow increased from 30 to 60

label: Dark Seer
descriptionHtml:
• Wall of Replicaillusions incoming damage reduced from 300% to 200%
  • Wall of Replica illusions outgoing damage increased from 60/75/90% to 70/85/100%
  • Wall of Replica now auto attacks the hero it made the illusion of (can still be controlled)

label: Dark Willow
descriptionHtml:
• Bedlamdamage reduced from 60/140/220 to 60/120/180
  • Bedlam rotation duration increased from 1.5 to 1.8 seconds
  • Cursed Crownno longer grants vision after it stuns
  • Level 25 Talent increased from +1 Terrorize Duration to +1.5

label: Dazzle
descriptionHtml: • FixedPoison Toucheffective area covered not scaling properly with cast range bonuses

label: Death Prophet
descriptionHtml: • Base Health regen reduced from 2 to 1.5

label: Earthshaker
descriptionHtml: • Base damage increased by 3

label: Ember Spirit
descriptionHtml:
• Flame Guardmagical damage absorbed rescaled from 50/200/350/500 to 80/220/360/500
  • Searing Chainsduration rescaled from 1/2/2/3 to 1.5/2/2.5/3
  • Searing Chains now does damage in 0.5 second intervals
  • Searing Chains total damage rescaled from 80/120/240/300 to 90/160/230/300

label: Enigma
descriptionHtml:
• Maleficestun duration rescaled from 0.25/0.5/0.75/1 to 0.4/0.6/0.8/1
  • Malefice cooldown rescaled from 15 to 18/17/16/15
  • Malefice mana cost reduced from 110/130/150/160 to 100/120/140/160

label: Faceless Void
descriptionHtml: • Chronospherecooldown increased from 140/125/110 to 140/130/120

label: Invoker
descriptionHtml: • Invokemana cost reduced from 60 to 40

label: Io
descriptionHtml:
• Tethercan now target Spell Immune allies
  • Tether cast point changed from 0.001 to 0
  • Tether no longer applies slow on impact
  • Spiritsnow apply a 20/40/60/80% movement speed slow on impact for 0.3 seconds
  • Spirits now have two fixed positions they go to, 700 and 100
    • No longer granular with toggles, but just a single press action
  • Spirits In/Out is just one ability now, alternates the direction
    • Has a 1.5 second cooldown, same hotkey as spirits ability
    • Base cooldown/duration is still the same
  • Spirits creep damage increased from 8/14/20/26 to 10/18/26/34
  • Spirits mana cost from 150 to 120/130/140/150
  • Spirits collision AoE increased from 70 to 110
  • Spirits explosion damage AoE increased from 300 to 360
  • Level 10 Talent changed from +400 Spirits Max Range to +25% XP
  • Level 25 Talent changed from Tether Stuns to -60s Relocate Cooldown

label: Leshrac
descriptionHtml: • Lightning Stormmana cost increased from 75/90/105/120 to 80/100/120/140

label: Lich
descriptionHtml: • Level 20 Talent increased from +120 Gold/Min to +180

label: Lycan
descriptionHtml:
• Summon Wolveshealth increased from 200/240/280/320 to 230/260/290/320
  • Summon Wolves damage increased from 17/28/37/46 to 26/34/42/50

label: Mirana
descriptionHtml:
• Leapspeed buff duration increased from 2 to 2.5
  • Leap attack speed rescaled from 25/50/75/100 to 40/60/80/100
  • Moonlight Shadownow grants 15% movement speed bonus while invisible

label: Monkey King
descriptionHtml: • Primal Springmana cost reduced from 130/120/110/100 to 100

label: Morphling
descriptionHtml:
• Adaptive StrikeTalent now has a 300 cast range buffer for the secondary targets
  • Level 10 Talent from +300 Waveform Range to +350
  • Level 25 Talent from +2 Multishot Adaptive Strike to +3

label: Necrophos
descriptionHtml: • Reaper's Scytherespawn time penalty increased from 10/20/30 to 15/30/45

label: Omniknight
descriptionHtml:
• Purificationcooldown increased from 11 to 14/13/12/11
  • Base armor reduced by 1

label: Outworld Devourer
descriptionHtml:
• Arcane Orbmana cost increased from 100/120/140/160 to 110/140/170/200
  • Fixed Arcane Orb not using mana if it misses the target

label: Ogre Magi
descriptionHtml: • Bloodluston self now grants you 30/50/70/90 Attack Speed (default is 30/40/50/60)

label: Pangolier
descriptionHtml:
• Rolling Thunderno longer gets canceled when rooted or disabled (rolls in place instead)
  • Rolling Thunder cooldown increased from 70/65/60 to 70
  • Swashbucklemana cost increased from 70/80/90/100 to 80/90/100/110
  • Shield Crashcooldown increased from 13 to 19/17/15/13
  • Fixed Shield Crash counting Spell Immune heroes
  • Level 10 Talent reduced from +2 Mana Regen to +1.5

label: Pudge
descriptionHtml:
• Base damage increased by 7
  • Rotslow reduced from 17/22/27/32 to 11/18/25/32

label: Pugna
descriptionHtml:
• Base armor increased by 1
  • Level 15 Talent increased from +2 Nether Ward Health to +3

label: Puck
descriptionHtml: • Level 20 Talent from -5s Waning Rift Cooldown to -8s

label: Queen of Pain
descriptionHtml:
• Sonic Wavedamage increased from 290/380/470 to 320/410/500
  • Sonic Wave Scepter damage increased from 325/440/555 to 370/480/590

label: Riki
descriptionHtml: • Tricks of the Tradenow attacks at a slower pace, nerfed from 0.5/0.45/0.4 to 0.6/0.55/0.5

label: Rubick
descriptionHtml: • Telekinesislift duration rescaled from 1.5/1.75/2/2.25 to 1.1/1.5/1.9/2.3

label: Sand King
descriptionHtml: • Caustic Finaleno longer triggers when a unit is denied

label: Shadow Demon
descriptionHtml: • Strength growth increased from 2.2 to 2.4

label: Shadow Fiend
descriptionHtml:
• Level 10 Talent reduced from 10% Spell Amplification to 8%
  • Level 15 Talent reduced from +40 Movement Speed to +35

label: Shadow Shaman
descriptionHtml: • FixedEther Shockeffective area covered not scaling properly with cast range bonuses

label: Silencer
descriptionHtml:
• Glaives of Wisdomfrom 15/30/45/60% to 25/40/55/70%
  • Global Silenceduration increased from 4/5/6 to 4.5/5.25/6
  • Level 15 Talent increased from +90 Gold/Min to +120

label: Slark
descriptionHtml:
• Base HP regen increased from 2.75 to 3.25
  • Shadow Dancemove speed bonus increased from 30/35/40% to 30/40/50%

label: Spectre
descriptionHtml:
• Spectral Daggermana cost rescaled from 130/140/150/160 to 100/120/140/160
  • Hauntillusion damage increased from 40% to 40/50/60%

label: Spirit Breaker
descriptionHtml:
• Greater Bashmovespeed bonus increased from 15% to 17%
  • Nether Strike's knockback now pushes the enemy twice the distance

label: Storm Spirit
descriptionHtml: • Level 15 Talent increased from +300 Health to +400

label: Sven
descriptionHtml:
• Great Cleavedistance increased from 570 to 625 (same as Battle Fury)
  • Great Cleave end radius increased from 300 to 330 (same as Battle Fury)

label: Terrorblade
descriptionHtml:
• Base HP regen reduced from 3 to 1.5
  • Reflectionillusion now disappears when the reflection slow debuff is removed
  • Sunderminimum HP rescaled from 25% to 35/30/25%
  • Sunder cast range reduced from 550 to 475

label: Timbersaw
descriptionHtml:
• Whirling Deathattribute reduction now considers bonus attributes (instead of only base)
  • Whirling Death attribute reduction lowered from 15% to 13%

label: Tiny
descriptionHtml: • Tree Grabarea damage reduced from 100% to 30/40/50/60%

label: Treant Protector
descriptionHtml: • Leech Seedduration increased from 4.5 to 5.25 (1 extra pulse)

label: Tusk
descriptionHtml:

  • Snowballspeed reduced from 675 to 600/625/650/675
  • Frozen Sigilno longer provides flying vision (ground only now)

label: Underlord
descriptionHtml:

label: Undying
descriptionHtml:
• Tombstonespawn interval improved from 4.5/4/3.5/3 to 4/3.5/3/2.5

  • Level 20 Talent increased from +4 Tombestone Attacks to +6

label: Ursa
descriptionHtml: • Base armor increased by 2

descriptionHtml: • Poison Novaduration increased from 16 to 18 seconds

label: Visage
descriptionHtml: • Grave Chillduration reduced from 3.25/4 .5/5.75/7 to 3/4/5/6

descriptionHtml:

  • Chaotic Offering GolemPermanent ImmolationDPS increased from 30/40/50 to 30/50/70

label: Weaver
descriptionHtml:
• Health regen increased from 1.5 to 2.5
  • The Swarmattack damage from 14/16/18/20 to 18/20/22/24

label: Windranger
descriptionHtml:
• Powershotdamage increased from 180/260/340/420 to 180/270/360/450

label: Winter Wyvern
descriptionHtml:

descriptionHtml:
